LanguageData.NY_ForgingDragonCloakGray.label: cloud-patterned cloak
LanguageData.NY_ForgingDragonCloakGray.description: A cloak designed for traveling. Decently protective against damage, dust or heat.
LanguageData.NY_ForgingDragonCloakGreen.label: furred cloak
LanguageData.NY_ForgingDragonCloakGreen.description: An luxurious cloat with furs to keep cold out. Different patterns are available for different subspecies.
LanguageData.NY_ForgingDragonDoctorCoat.label: loong doctor coat
LanguageData.NY_ForgingDragonDoctorCoat.description: A coat designed for medical workers. This coat includes pockets for storing drug and tools, herb packets, and silver lines are blended into the textile.
LanguageData.NY_ForgingDragonMusicianCoat.label: loong orchestra coat
LanguageData.NY_ForgingDragonMusicianCoat.description: The uniform of the "orchestra" special forces, which fights with their musical instruments. While lacking in defense, this coat boosts the mobility of wearer.
LanguageData.NY_ForgingDragonSoldierCloth.label: loong soldier uniform
LanguageData.NY_ForgingDragonSoldierCloth.description: The standard uniform of loong militias, with armor plates under the textile. Provides respectable defense without hindering wearer's movement.
LanguageData.NY_ForgingDragonSoldierClothPlus.label: loong soldier armor
LanguageData.NY_ForgingDragonSoldierClothPlus.descrip: Solder uniform with additional armor. Common among loong snipers, since it's a rare talent among loongs.
